text: Rikus Pretorius (born ) is a South African rugby union player for in the Currie Cup. His regular position is centre. He made his Currie Cup debut for Western Province in August 2019, starting their Round Seven match of the 2019 season against the . ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1999 births Category:Rugby union centres Category:South Africa Under-20 international rugby union players
title: Rikus Pretorius
